How to install Quber¶

Requirements

  1. Python 2.7 or above

  2. Any IDE of your choice(VsCode)

Installation

  1. Download the project package(Don’t include the app.db file)

  2. Open the project package on your IDE

  3. Within the project folder on the terminal run the following
    Enter python3 and the run the following-

    from app import db from app.models import User db.create_all()

  4. python run.py

project
